discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Assess the risk associated with the new regulation.

When an enterprise learns of a new regulation that may impact the delivery of one of its core technology services, the FIRST step should be to assess the risk associated with the new regulation.

Assessing the risk allows the enterprise to understand the potential impact of the regulation on its operations, services, compliance requirements, and overall business objectives. It involves evaluating the likelihood of non-compliance, the potential consequences of non-compliance, and identifying any gaps or areas of vulnerability within the current processes or systems.

Once the risk associated with the new regulation is assessed, the enterprise can then develop an informed action plan to address the compliance requirements and mitigate any potential risks. This may involve engaging with the risk team, updating the risk management framework, and determining whether the board wants to comply with the regulation. However, assessing the risk is the crucial first step in effectively responding to the regulatory change.
